title: WEF economists see modest global recovery amid AI and debt risks
description: The global economic outlook has improved modestly but remains clouded by high debt levels and uncertainty surrounding artificial intelligence valuations,
content:
The global economic outlook has improved modestly but remains clouded by high debt levels and uncertainty surrounding artificial intelligence valuations, according to a report released by the World Economic Forum (WEF).

title: ‘Will help shift that centre of gravity’: Nobel laureate Duflo on MIT to Zurich shift
description: At the Jaipur Literature Festival, Nobel Prize-winning economist Esther Duflo discussed the updated edition of her book ‘Poor Economics’ and highlighted issues like social protection, climate change, and the impact of artificial intelligence on India’s economy. She also expressed concerns about recent data on Indian poverty and emphasized the political consequences of global inequality.

title: Global sports face challenges from 'AI slop' misinformation
description: Jan 16 - A study by AI risk management platform Alethea into the surge in artificial intelligence-generated fake content, dubbed \"AI slop,\" has warned sports teams, leagues and fans of the risks posed by increasingly sophisticated digital misinformation. Read more at straitstimes.com.

title: The Hidden Energy Costs of Artificial Intelligence
description: Uncertainty over artificial intelligence’s true energy consumption is driving governments and companies to overinvest in new power capacity—often fossil-based—while obscuring the industry-driven roots of AI’s growing environmental impact.
content: Projections for the AI sector’s energy needs in the coming years are massive in scale. The International Energy Agency expects AI’s energy demand to double between now and 2030, presenting a serious challenge for energy security in many nations and r... [4069 chars]

title: California demands Elon Musk's xAI stop producing sexual deepfake content
description: Jan 16 (Reuters) - California ‌Attorney General Robert Bonta on Friday ‌sent a cease-and-desist letter to xAI ‌demanding the company stop the creation and distribution of artificial intelligence-generated nonconsensual sexualized imagery by its Grok ‍chatbot.

title: Musk's Grok AI faces more scrutiny after generating sexual deepfake images
description: Elon Musk was forced to put restrictions on X and its AI chatbot, Grok, after its image generator sparked outrage around the world. Grok created non-consensual sexualized images, prompting some countries to ban the bot. Liz Landers discussed Grok's troubles with Riana Pfefferkorn of the Stanford Institute for Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence.
content:
Amna Nawaz:
Elon Musk was forced to put more restrictions on his social media platform X and its A.I. chatbot, Grok, this week after its image generator sparked outrage around the world.
